data.text: @Times_n_Latte @EbonyJHilton_MD @Cleavon_MD What’s on hold anymore? It’s just masking and a little common sense. I don’t get it.
@EbonyJHilton_MD @Paleonut_ Thank you for your hard work in a horrible situation. I will continue to wear an N95 mask until the covid numbers are a whole lot better.

@EbonyJHilton_MD I hear you & really hate this 4 u & other med prof who have 2 deal with this. Just know that you’re a blessing to all those you’re caring for. My heart breaks every time I have 2 walk n2 a Dr’s ofc now & only 2 out of 10 have masks incld staff😢going bk virt.
@EbonyJHilton_MD @Cleavon_MD Are the people you’re seeing in the ICU vaccinated? With all due respect, how much longer do we put our lives on hold for those who refuse to be vaccinated?
@EbonyJHilton_MD so sad. people are just so selfish 😔
@EbonyJHilton_MD Some people think they can cancel Covid.

@EbonyJHilton_MD @Cleavon_MD I feel your frustration. In a review of stories during past pandemics, people just could not keep up the restrictions. Perhaps reviewing Sweden's approach might find that intermittent restrictions are more effective than continual ones.
@EbonyJHilton_MD BNO just said they are stopping w Covid data. Does anyone know another source for daily counts?
@forktown385 @EbonyJHilton_MD Same here in some parts of ILLINOIS.   🤦🏽‍♀️
